# sitecore_editing_host_build_client (Resource)

Manages a Sitecore Editing Host Build automation client



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The environment ID for the Editing Host Build client
- `name` (String) The name of the Editing Host Build client
- `project_id` (String) The project ID for the Editing Host Build client

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the Editing Host Build client

### Read-Only

- `client_id` (String) The client ID for authentication
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The client secret for authentication
- `id` (String) The ID of the Editing Host Build client
